Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Xiane checked the sensors, since the beast wars these time rifts needed exp=
loration and the noble follower of Silverbolt rose to the task that was pre=
sented to him.
    In a small shuttle the shining silver bot zipped across =
the cosmos, ejecting alarm beacons near any rifts he came across, areas whe=
re trans warp use not only moved a shuttle across great distances but also =
through the very fabric of time.
    Now it was sector vector sigma alpha, =
the humans of the era named the system alpha centauri. Here in the dark voi=
d of space Xiane came across an old decepticon attack probe, crash landed a=
mongst a dense asteroid feild that masked its trans warp signatures. It was=
 not until its ancient but still operational weapons system began opening f=
ire on his small shuttle that Xiane took note of it, but by then it was too=
 late.
    Plasma fire tore through the hull of his ship, alarms blaring as=
 the shuttles power source ruptured, going critical in minutes. Xiane slamm=
ed his hand down upon the ejection switch the cock pit served two fold purp=
oses. As part of the shuttle Xiane flew from it, but now was the sealed coc=
kpit seperated from the rest of the shuttle its stasis pod fuction kicked i=
n, an SOS beacon flaring to life even as the enclosed compartment pulled aw=
ay from the ruined ship.
    The power supply exploded, tearing the ship ap=
art, tearing a hole in the delicate fabric of space and time. Through this =
hole the sleeping Xiane was hurled like a comet. The tear opening above the=
 old earth of the past spitting its traveller out with such force hurtling =
the escape pod into earths orbit, the beacon still emitting an SOS signal o=
n all frequencies.
    The pod hit the earth with a small explosion, the po=
d hitting the earth tearing a deep gouge in the dirt as the pod used the ea=
rths crust as a landing pad. As was custom to do in such situations a scann=
er erupted from the pod and began searching for a compatible life form, as =
the scanner returned to the ship Xiane's body was being altered for its new=
 form...

(OOC...)

    A bit long hope it's not considered "moding". :)

X=
